A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A disservice to the franchise and a big way to s**t  all over the saga legacy and the characters\, old and new\, we all grew to love. If they wanted to put an end to the era of Skywalker Family Drama on Star Wars\, I'm sure there were ways to do that which still respected the fans and the legacy. Oh well\, what else should we expect from Disney?
